oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Incomplete split-plots in variety trials - based on alpha-designs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kristensen, K.
Willads, J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Technology assessment
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These incomplete block designs were used in 4 trials wit varieties and mixtures of Spring barley within the project BAROF. The trials were used as a compromise between the traditional split-plot design and the randomised complete block design. The method of constructing such are described together with the efficiency of the designs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kristensen, K. and Willads, J. (2005) Incomplete split-plots in variety trials - based on alpha-designs. Speech at: PAGEN Workshop, Poznan, Poland, October 11-13, 2005.
